meanings.definition: A channel or passage for waste or drainage.
meanings.sent1: The wasteways in the city help carry away dirty water.
meanings.sent2: The factory had a designated wasteways for disposing of excess chemicals.
meanings.sent3: The wasteways in the house were so clean, they almost looked like tiny rivers.
meanings.sent4: The wasteways of the city flowed like veins, carrying waste to its proper destination.
meanings.sent5: The wasteways were like secret tunnels, hidden beneath the surface of the town.

meanings.definition: A route or path for waste materials to be disposed of.
meanings.sent1: The wasteways behind the building were used for discarding old furniture.
meanings.sent2: The trucks followed the wasteways to the landfill to dump their garbage.
meanings.sent3: The wasteways seemed to have a mind of their own, guiding the trash to its final stop.
meanings.sent4: The wasteways snaked through the city, carrying away the unwanted debris.
meanings.sent5: The wasteways were like a conveyor belt, efficiently moving waste out of sight.
